name: Telling Us Bees
description:
You are a hive of bees. Your job has always been to take care of Olivia's garden.

Recently she doesn't seem like her old self again. So it's time to do what you do best--cultivate her garden! Choose to make honey or care for the berry bushes for some household goods, and be there to listen to her when she needs it. There's always something worth telling us bees.

Updates will be made intermittently as more art / content is added.

Thank you for playing my game! <3

> Made for Team Dogpit's Cultivation Jam 2022!
